name: Mortuary Cases
query: SELECT CASE WHEN mc.paid = 0 THEN CONCAT( '', mc.name, '' ) ELSE mc.name -- Just show the name without a link for paid cases END AS item_link, mc.name AS ID, CONCAT(mcl.first_name, ' ', mcl.last_name) AS Patient_Name, mc.creation AS Date_of_Request, mc.grand_total AS Grand_Total, CASE WHEN mc.paid = 1 THEN 'Paid' ELSE 'Unpaid' END AS Status FROM `tabMortuary Case` mc LEFT JOIN `tabMotuary_Client` mcl ON mc.patient__cient = mcl.name WHERE DATE(mc.creation) = %(date)s; /* So there were a few naming errors during the creation of the doctypes 1. tabMotuary_Client is missing the r for mortuary 2. patient__cient is missing the l for but these will be kept as they are because changing names causes in consistencies in frappe */
